Text:
Holy propaganda!
Wasal, muslims don't really want to help people. They want to make others believe the same lies as they do themselves. That's no help...
Too bad you're unable to tell the difference.

Quoted from FZ:
"You have to have this kind of sceptical attitude, because every time you turn around in 
contemporary society, somebody is trying to hand you a turd wrapped in a gold foil.
Well, it's a turd none the less."
